rules.fullName: BRIGHT CloudCMA Cancellation Confirmation Email
rules.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c,'CloudCMA') && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c, 'Terminate') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c, 'Deprovisioned') && ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c , 'BRIGHT') ,true, false)

rules.fullName: BRIGHT CloudCMA New Sign Up Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, 'CloudCMA') && ISPICKVAL( Provisioned_Status__c, 'Provisioned') && ISPICKVAL( Product_Status__c, 'New') && ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c , 'BRIGHT'), true, false)

rules.fullName: BRIGHT CloudCMA Product Change Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c ,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c, 'BRIGHT') && ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c,'CloudCMA')

rules.fullName: BRIGHT Sphere Product Change Email Confirmation
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update'), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c,'Sphere by Bright MLS') , ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') , OR(ISPICKVAL(Product_Sub_Type__c ,'Sphere by Bright MLS Pro'), ISPICKVAL(Product_Sub_Type__c , 'Sphere by Bright MLS Basic')), (ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c,'BRIGHT')))

rules.fullName: BRIGHT XactSite Product Change to XS Agent IDX Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c ,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && OR(Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Total', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Select', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Premium', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Agent IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office Website') && OR(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) == 'XactSite Agent IDX') && (ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c,'BRIGHT'))

rules.formula: IF(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c ,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && OR(Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Total', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Select', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Premium', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Agent IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office Website') && OR(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) == 'XactSite Office IDX') && (ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c,'BRIGHT'))

rules.fullName: Product Provisioning Outbound Message
SMS CloudCMA Cancellation Confirmation Email
rules.description: CloudCMA Cancellation Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c,'CloudCMA') && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c, 'Terminate') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c, 'Deprovisioned') && (ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c , 'MRIS') || ISPICKVAL( Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c , '')) ,true, false)

rules.fullName: SMS CloudCMA New Sign Up Email Confirmation
rules.description: New Sign Up Email Confirmation for the product CloudCMA
rules.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, 'CloudCMA') && ISPICKVAL( Provisioned_Status__c, 'Provisioned') && ISPICKVAL( Product_Status__c, 'New') && (ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c , 'MRIS') || ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c , '')), true, false)

rules.fullName: SMS CloudCMA Product Change to CloudCMA Monthly Email Confirmation
rules.description: SMS CloudCMA Product Change to CloudCMA Monthly Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF( Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c ,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && OR( Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA 1 Year', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA 2 Year', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA Monthly' )&& OR( Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) == 'CloudCMA Monthly' ) && OR( ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c, 'MRIS'), ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c, '') )

rules.fullName: SMS CloudCMA Product Change to CloudCMA One Year Email Confirmation
rules.description: SMS CloudCMA Product Change to CloudCMA One Year Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && OR( Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA 1 Year', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA 2 Year', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA Monthly' )&& OR( Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) == 'CloudCMA 1 Year' ) && OR( ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c, 'MRIS'), ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c, '') )

rules.fullName: SMS CloudCMA Product Change to CloudCMA Two Year Email Confirmation
rules.description: SMS CloudCMA Product Change to CloudCMA Two Year Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c ,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && OR( Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA 1 Year', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA 2 Year', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'CloudCMA Monthly' ) && OR( Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) == 'CloudCMA 2 Year' ) && OR( ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c, 'MRIS'), ISPICKVAL(Subscription__r.Service_Jurisdiction__c, '') )

rules.fullName: TREND XactSite Product Change to XS Premium Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c ,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && OR(Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Total', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Select', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Premium', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Agent IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office Website') && OR(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) == 'XactSite Premium') && (ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c,'TREND'))

rules.fullName: TREND XactSite Product Change to XS Select Email Confirmation
rules.formula: IF(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c ,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && OR(Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Total', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Select', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Premium', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Agent IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office Website') && OR(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) == 'XactSite Select') && (ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c,'TREND'))

rules.formula: IF(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) != Previuos_ProductSubType__c ,true,false) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c,'Update') && ISPICKVAL(Provisioned_Status__c,'Provisioned') && OR(Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Total', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Select', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Premium', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Agent IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office IDX', Previuos_ProductSubType__c == 'XactSite Office Website') && OR(Text(Product_Sub_Type__c) == 'XactSite Total') && (ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c,'TREND'))

rules.fullName: TREND XactSite Select New Sign Up Email Confirmation
rules.description: XactSite New Sign Up Email Confirmation for the products XactSite Select
